code: export var addToCart=function addToCart(cart){return{type:"ADD_ITEM_TO_CART",payload:cart};};export var resetCartList=function resetCartList(){return{type:"RESET_CART_LIST",payload:[]};};export var updateFeeOther=function updateFeeOther(feeOther){return{type:"UPDATE_FEE_OTHER",payload:feeOther};};;export var updateAmountToCart=function updateAmountToCart(cart){return{type:"UPDATE_AMOUNT_CART",payload:cart};};export var removeToCart=function removeToCart(cart){return{type:"REMOVE_CART",payload:cart};};export var addAddress=function addAddress(address){return{type:"ADD_ADDRESS",payload:address};};export var addAddressOther=function addAddressOther(addressOther){return{type:"ADD_ADDRESS_OTHER",payload:addressOther};};export var addDeliveryMethod=function addDeliveryMethod(deliveryMethod){return{type:"ADD_DELIVERY_METHOD",payload:deliveryMethod};};export var addPaymentMethod=function addPaymentMethod(paymentMethod){return{type:"ADD_PAYMENT_METHOD",payload:paymentMethod};};export var setStatus=function setStatus(status){return{type:"STATUS",payload:status};};export var setID=function setID(id){return{type:"ID",payload:id};};
